alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A line of rain showers will impact portions of east central Sublette and southern Fremont Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of rain showers near Dickinson Park, or 17 miles southwest of Fort Washakie, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Washakie and Milford around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ethete and Kinnear. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
